cast.name: 萨利姆·克希乌什 Salim Kechiouche

director.name: 伊夫·克里斯蒂安·福尼尔 Yves Christian Fournier

introduction: Kadhafi, Algerian rapper 26 years, ex-member of a street gang and the father of a young boy out of prison and wants to settle down. Will it happen? Fleur, young Haitian mother of 17, who lives a conflictual relationship with his mother and abusive and passionate with the father of her daughter. She dreams of becoming a nurse. Suzie, a white dancer 20 years old who falls for Evans, a black gangster. Their relationship takes an unexpected turn. And finally, Dickens, 16. He wants to be part of the controlled by his elder brother, who refuses him access gang.
